thread.title: 10 Best Lip Plumpers - Lip Plumper Gloss
thread.title_full: 10 Best Lip Plumpers - Lip Plumper Gloss

author: Lauren Valenti
title: 10 Best Lip Plumpers - Lip Plumper Gloss
text:
11 No-Nonsense Lip-Plumping Products We Love 
No needles here. By Lauren Valenti Feb 10, 2017 
As far as desired traits go, a plush pout is certainly up there in 2017. Lip injections are one route you can take—if you're not needle shy and have the funds. But if non-invasive is more your style, there are plenty of plumping lip elixirs that will give you instant lift and volume for a similar effect. Here's what we swipe on when we want our lips to do the most. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 1 Smashbox O-PLUMP Intuitive Lip Plumper With Goji Berry-C Complex 
This plumping treatment resets lips with marine botanicals and avocado oil while reacting to your natural pH to create a custom shade of pink. 
Smashbox O-PLUMP Intuitive Lip Plumper With Goji Berry-C Complex, $26; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell 2 Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme 
This ultra-moisturizing serum combines Vitamin E and dehydrated marine sponge to stimulate blood flow for fullness. You can wear it on its own or as a precursor to lip color. 
Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme, $28; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 3 GlamGlow Plumprageous Matte Lip Treatment 
If you prefer a non-shiny finish, this matte lip primer has a triple plumping complex with potent botanical actives to create an amped-up lip canvas. 
GlamGlow Plumprageous Matte Lip Treatment, $24; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell 4 Dr. Brandt Skincare Needles No More 3D Lip PLUMPfix 
A serum duo, you have a soft pink formula with Brandt's special PLUMPfix technology for taking the lips' overall appearance next level during the daytime and a cream-hued treatment with two nourishing complexes that restore overnight. 
Dr. Brandt Skincare Needles No More 3D Lip PLUMPfix, $39; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 5 Lancer Volume Enhancing Lip Serum 
This serum contains croton lechleri sap, AKA dragon's blood amongst Amazonian tribes, which is packed with antioxidants and polyphenols that will bring lips back to life. 
Lancer Volume Enhancing Lip Serum, $42; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell 6 Dior Dior Addict Lip Maximizer High Volume Lip Plumper 
For a shimmery wash of color, swipe on this high-shine formula, which is packed with collagen and marine-based fillers for extra volume 
Dior Dior Addict Lip Maximizer High Volume Lip Plumper, $33; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 7 Ciaté London Magic Pout Potion Lip Plumping Primer 
This plumping potion will enhance your pout in a pH-informed shade that neutralizes with your natural lip color. 
Ciaté London Magic Pout Potion Lip Plumping Primer, $20; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell 8 Murad Rapid Collagen Infusion For Lips 
This lip serum looks to collagen amino acids to reduce the appearance of fine lines while creating microcirculation for fullness. 
Murad Rapid Collagen Infusion For Lips, $24; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 9 Know Cosmetics No Thin Lips Secret Lip Plumper 
You'll feel a little tingle when you coat your lips with this clear gloss as it's filled with sensory, cooling ingredients that direct blood flow to limp lips. 
Know Cosmetics No Thin Lips Secret Lip Plumper $18; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell 10 GrandeLIPS Hydrating Lip Plumper 
This vanilla-flavored plumper is fused with hyaluronic acid and a special Volulip technology that boosts hydration, volume, and plumpness in as little as three minutes. 
GrandeLIPS Hydrating Lip Plumper, $27; sephora.com . Design by Betsy Farrell
